citations.narrative:
Documented review of the contingency plan had not been performed since 2023. Annual review of the plan ensures that
best practices continue to be followed, and any necessary updates are made to ensure that the facility is prepared for
disasters. The documentation of the review ensures accountability. The facility must review the contingency plan and
document their review on an ongoing annual basis.
Correct by 01/22/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.

disasters. The documentation of the review ensures accountability. The facility must review the contingency plan and 
document their review on an ongoing annual basis.
